title: Legendary drummer and founder of Cream rock band Ginger Baker dies aged 80
text:
Legendary drummer Ginger Baker, who founded the rock band Cream, has died at the age of 80.

The renowned musician, real name Peter Edward Baker, was "critically ill" in hospital according to a family statement posted to his Twitter page last week.

It asked fans to "keep him in your prayers".

Baker suffered from osteoarthritis, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and a long battle with drug addiction, and underwent heart surgery three years ago.

It is not clear why he was admitted to hospital on this occasion.

His family announced on his Twitter page today: "We are very sad to say that Ginger has passed away peacefully in hospital this morning. Thank you to everyone for your kind words over the past weeks."
description: Legendary drummer Ginger Baker, who founded the rock band Cream, has died at the age of 80.
